create_csv.py

Creates solution.csv file of all the logs retrieved.

Saves the average and standard deviation of all the saved data inside /logs/ folder to solution.csv to be further analyzed.

create_csv.average(lst)[source]

Calculates average of a list

create_csv.findLowestFolder(list1, list2)[source]

Sorts the folders in ascending order to increase organizational structure of the project

create_csv.sortFoldersFunction(list)[source]

Bubble Sort implementation
